title: Cannot get file extension from SWT FileDialog
description: When using the SWT FileDialog, it is not possible to retrieve the file extension. This limitation makes the dialog difficult to use as it is not possible to determine the correct file extension to append to the file name.
OB: When the SWT FileDialog is opened and a file is selected, the file extension is not returned or accessible.
EB: The FileDialog should provide a way to retrieve the file extension of the selected file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the SWT FileDialog.
2. Select the '.zip' option in the 'Save as type' dropdown.
3. Enter a file name (e.g. 'test').
